title: Update Announcement
content:
It turns out the boot issue with the PIF implementation was caused by using the wrong framework.jar. That’s now resolved.

In the next version, some apps will remain preinstalled, including Gmail, YouTube, Game-related features, eSIM functions, Chrome, and Calculator.

We’d love your suggestions for what else should be included. Share your ideas here: https://t.me/meidyoschat/1308

Additionally, a version with OTA updates working will be published soon. The PIF feature is delayed for now due to technical issues, but it’s on the roadmap.
